author: Alan Weedon
title: Why does a Chinese lab keep getting accused of being the coronavirus source, despite zero evidence?
description: From the White House to the Washington Post, a virology lab in Wuhan stands accused of being the potential source of the global coronavirus pandemic, which China denies. So who to believe?
content:
Posted 
April 18, 2020 04:47:16
Amid the coronavirus pandemic, various theories about its origins have been thrown out or supported by the scientific community. 
Key points:
